channel.title: The "Contract" Page?
channel.description:
You know when you first visit the forums, and you are greeted by that contact page, where you have to type "Yes" then submit?
Well, I was wondering if anyone could help me make one of those for my new site (not nextg3n), but I do need one and it has to be somewhat easy to edit :P
If anyone can help me out, just PM me here, or talk to me on MSN, nextg3nauths@hotmail.com .
Thank-you =D

item.title: The "Contract" Page?
item.dc:creator: @usernamelol .Fusion
item.description:
@usernamelol wrote:

Heres the format. But you need to use the cookie.

<!DOCTYPE html PUBLIC "-//W3C//DTD XHTML 1.0 Transitional//EN"
        "http://www.w3.org/TR/xhtml1/DTD/xhtml1-transitional.dtd">
<html>
<head>
<title>Sitenamehere TOS</title>
<style type="text/css">
body{font-family: verdana; font-size: 10pt;}
div{background: #FFFFFF; width: 70%; border: 1px solid black; font-family: verdana; font-size: 10pt;}
input{border: 1px solid black;}
</style>
</head>
<body bgcolor="#000000">
<center>
<div>
<b>Sitenamehere Terms of Service</b>
</div>
<br />
<div style="text-align: left;">
<tt>

By typing <i>'yes'</i> you agree to everything stated below:<br /><br />

INTRODUCTION HERE (top part on Mopar's TOS).<br /><br />

INTRODUCTION HERE (top part on Mopar's TOS)
</tt>
</div>


<br />

<div style="text-align: left;">
<tt>
In order to use the forum you must agree to all of these rules as well:<br />
<ol>
<li>Rulet!</li><br />

<li>Rule.</li><br />

<li>Rule.</li><br />

<li>Rule</li><br />

<li>Rule</li><br />

<li>Rule</li><br />

<li>Rule.</li><br />

<li>Rule</li><br />

<li>Rule</li><br />

<li>Rule</li><br />

<li>Rule</li><br />

<li>Rule</li><br />

<li>Rules</li>
</ol> 
</tt>
</div>

<br /><br /><font color="white">Type <i>'yes'</i> if you agree to <i>ALL</i> of the above terms.<br />

cookies mustbe enabled for this to work.</font> <br /><form method="post" action="what page you want it to go to here">  <input name="agree" size="20" /><br />
  <input type="submit" name="Submit" value="I Agree" />
  <input type="submit" name="Cancel" value="Cancel" />
</form></center>
</body>
</html>

Change “div{background: #FFFFFF” to the color of your text BG #FFFFFF is white.

Change “” change the 000000’s to the body background (mopars is blue). 000000 is black.

Read full topic

item.title: The "Contract" Page?
item.dc:creator: @moparisthebest Moparisthebest
item.description:
@moparisthebest wrote:

Its not hard at all, I just set a cookie if they agree, and then check for that cookie. All you really need to know is the header("Location: "); function and the cookie function, google them

Read full topic
